00031 static const QSslCertificate certificate(certData);
00032 static const QSslKey key(keyData, QSsl::Rsa);
00033 
00034 Server::Server(QObject* parent) : QTcpServer(parent)
00035 {
00036     if (key.isNull())
00037         qDebug() << "SSL key is null";
00038     if (certificate.isNull())
00039         qDebug() << "SSL cert is null";
00040 }
00041 
00042 Server::~Server()
00043 {
00044     foreach(QSslSocket* s, m_pendingConnections) {
00045         s->deleteLater();
00046     }
00047     m_pendingConnections.clear();
00048 }
00049 
00050 bool Server::hasPendingConnections() const
00051 {
00052     return m_pendingConnections.count() != 0;
00053 }
00054 
00055 QTcpSocket* Server::nextPendingConnection()
00056 {
00057     QTcpSocket*s = m_pendingConnections.takeFirst();
00058     s->disconnect();
00059     return s;
00060 }
00061 
00062 void Server::incomingConnection(int socketDescriptor)
00063 {
00064     qDebug() << "Incoming connection";
00065     QSslSocket* socket = new QSslSocket;
00066     connect(socket, SIGNAL(encrypted()),
00067             this, SLOT(socketEncrypted()));
00068     connect(socket, SIGNAL(sslErrors(QList<QSslError>)),
00069             this, SLOT(sslError(QList<QSslError>)));
00070     connect(socket, SIGNAL(error(QAbstractSocket::SocketError)),
00071             this, SLOT(socketError(QAbstractSocket::SocketError)));
00072     connect(socket, SIGNAL(stateChanged(QAbstractSocket::SocketState)),
00073             this, SLOT(stateChanged(QAbstractSocket::SocketState)));
00074     connect(socket, SIGNAL(modeChanged(QSslSocket::SslMode)),
00075             this, SLOT(modeChanged(QSslSocket::SslMode)));
00076     socket->setPrivateKey(key);
00077     socket->setLocalCertificate(certificate);
00078     if (socket->setSocketDescriptor(socketDescriptor)) {
00079         socket->startServerEncryption();
00080         qDebug() << "Started server encryption";
00081     } else {
00082         qDebug() << "Could not set socket descriptor!";
00083         socket->deleteLater();
00084     }
00085 }
00086 
00087 void Server::modeChanged(QSslSocket::SslMode mode)
00088 {
00089     qDebug() << mode;
00090 }
00091 
00092 void Server::stateChanged(QAbstractSocket::SocketState socketState)
00093 {
00094     qDebug() << socketState;
00095 }

00097 void Server::sslError(const QList<QSslError>& errors)
00098 {
00099     qDebug() << "SSL ERROR";
00100     foreach(QSslError e, errors) {
00101         qDebug() << e.error() << e.errorString();
00102         if (e.error() == QSslError::NoPeerCertificate) {
00103             qobject_cast<QSslSocket*>(sender())->ignoreSslErrors();
00104         }
00105     }
00106 }
00107 
00108 void Server::socketError(QAbstractSocket::SocketError e)
00109 {
00110     qDebug() << e;
00111 }
00112 
00113 void Server::socketEncrypted()
00114 {
00115     qDebug() << "socket encrypted";
00116     QSslSocket* socket = qobject_cast<QSslSocket*>(sender());
00117     if (socket) {
00118         qDebug() << "Socket go!";
00119         m_pendingConnections << socket;
00120         emit newConnection();
00121     }
00122 }
